attributes.action: Take note of how many professional people will immigrate if Labour wins another term in office.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recognise the damage Labour has done to the UK economy, how Labour has disincentivised people to work to better themselves, and how Labour is driving away UK talent to overseas locations where taxes are lower and productivity is rewarded.

rejection.details: This is party political material, and thus a matter for communication with the appropriate parties.
